description:
Dakai the Magpie returns from Nagan Labyrinth City with a powerful magic item. Taren the Guarded tasks Dakai with finding the traitor behind the attacks on merchant caravans. Meanwhile, Regnejee the Wings of Sunset interrogates the wyvern soldiers in search of a certain rule-breaker.
Source: Disney+

titles.title: Dakai le pie et Regnejee les Ailes du crépuscule
Dakai the Magpie and Regnejee the Wings of Sunset
Dakai, die Elster und Regnejee, Flügel der Dämmerung
Kasasagi no Dakai to Sekki no Tsubasa Regnejee
鵲のダカイと夕暉の翼レグネジィ
